channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 01:32 Alarm response in Cherkasy region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 01:32 Alarm response in Cherkasy region. Stay tuned for further messages. #햖햣햨햟혜혧햨햟_쮏쐃햟혜혝혧 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 01:18 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - Myriv territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 01:18 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - Myriv territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community #Dnipropetrovsk_Oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 22:40 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 22:40 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
